recommended_degree: Elektro Mekanika, Teknik Mekanika, Elektronika, Teknik Sipil Bangunan Gedung, Teknik Sipil (Diploma, Sarjana)
job_description:
1. Minimum 3 years of experience in building construction with specific expertise in handling MEP (Mechanical, Electrical, and Plumbing) projects in Hospital facilities
2. Must possess SKA (Sertifikat Keahlian/Certificate of Competency) in one of the following categories: Associate Expert in Construction Management (Ahli Madya Manajemen Konstruksi), Associate Expert in Mechanical Engineering (Ahli Mekanikal), Associate Expert in Building Engineering (Teknik Bangunan Gedung).
